title: The Drug problem, what do you think?
creator_credit: Eli Hollander, Stanley Croner and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Defines a drug as any chemical that alters normal biological functions and suggests that the advertising media promotes drug use. Stimulates discussion that will help students think realistically about the abuse of common drugs and the danger of buying street drugs.
